channel.title: Any networked painting applications?
channel.description:
Besides open canvas1.1? I've been looking for something decent that doesn't glitch to shit. Open canvas has been fine, but the networking is too god damn buggy. Random spikes of lag can ruin everything, and when someone joins a session there's a high chance random scribbles show up everywhere.
Plus I'm just curious. Are there any other painting programs besides open canvas with the same functionality?

item.title: Any networked painting applications?
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
OC and Hamachi 2 are what I’ve been using. There are a few oekaki paintchats that are even worse and require numerous plugins

Read full topic
